snippet: The Obama Administration must pursue further penalties against BP under federal environmental laws.
abstract: Editorial urges Justice Department to vigorously pursue penalties against BP for Gulf of Mexico oil spill under federal environmental laws; contends fines and other payments totaling $4.5 billion that company has agreed to by admitting culpability in spill should not be all that it pays for its careless and destructive behavior.
lead_paragraph: The Obama Administration must pursue further penalties against BP under federal environmental laws.
